author: _shemnon
content: Payable is not an EVM concept, it is a solidity concept expressed in EVM bytecode.  Delegate call is problematic because of the way it tracks value and because of the way solidity checks for non-payable.  I am unaware of such documentation.

author: big_tech_sux
content: btw what is the motivation for dataloadN? as it causes issues with initcode validation like <@403707149043105803> was mentioning last EOF call
